Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Payroll_Costed_Actuals_Filter_Data.description: Reference to existing Worktags. Worktags selected must match the worktag type selected previously. They have to be active and cannot be hierarchical. The Run Effort Certification task will then collect employees with payroll lines tagged with the worktags specified.

Effort_Certification_Type_Data.description: Effort Certification Type can contain multiple Payroll Actuals Costed To selections.  This is additional filter criteria to select which employees will be selected in the Run Effort Certification task.

validation.validation: A dimension may only be specified once.
Worktag type specified for a Pay Actuals Costed To selection is not valid.  Valid worktag types: [validTypes]
Worktags specified for a Pay Actuals Costed To Selection must match the Type selected
The "Group By" and "Use Full Worktags" fields cannot be changed because it may impact costing allocations of existing Effort Certifications.
Worktags specified for a Payroll Actuals Costed To selection must be active. Please remove the following inactive worktags: [hierarchies]
Worktags specified for a Payroll Actuals Costed To selection must be active. Please remove the following inactive worktags: [worktags]

You can't change the Routing by Worker Organization Assignment setting while the effort certification type is in use. To change this setting, cancel any active effort certifications of this type, or create a new effort certification type with the desired setting.
